name: Warrior of Chaos
description:
Warrior of Chaos is a digital collectible card game (CCG) featuring gorgeous card art, highly balanced gameplay, and streamlined game rules.

Start your campaign by choosing your Human Hero, and get a free starter deck. Battle with AI opponents.
You must decide which strategy to use as you build your deck, in one of the most balanced card games out there!

FEATURES

- 200 cards with many skills
- Fantastic graphics and special effects
- Completely free to play! No "pay to win" here!

Command mighty characters in epic card battles and build a deck of iconic heroes in this thrilling tactical card game!
